title: Spurious dragon death announcement in Spectator Mode
body:
https://i.imgur.com/flnWeQM.png[/img]

Red team killed dragon (mountain or something), then, a couple minutes later while they were killing Baron, the game said that the red dragon had slain the red dragon. It confused me until I realized it was a bug.

replies.body:
Lol, its Mord. XD

No joke.

It's one of our new bugs. If Mordekiaser kills the Dragon, it says "a minion has slain the dragon"

xDD

Mords bugs are getting out of hand ROFL

They've been out of hand, but this is just too funny.

> [{quoted}](name=BigDaddyKingMord,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=tfiE2kZF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-01-14T11:00:57.852+0000)
>
> Lol, its Mord. XD
> 
> No joke.
> 
> It's one of our new bugs. If Mordekiaser kills the Dragon, it says "a minion has slain the dragon"
> 
> xDD
> 
> Mords bugs are getting out of hand ROFL
> 
> They've been out of hand, but this is just too funny.

I... see. o.o

Does it do that in live matches as well?

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=tfiE2kZF,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-01-14T11:07:03.148+0000)
>
> I... see. o.o
> 
> Does it do that in live matches as well?

Idk what you mean.

It's all games in Summoner's Rift. The bug IS live atm, if that's what you're asking.

> [{quoted}](name=BigDaddyKingMord,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=tfiE2kZF,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2019-01-14T19:26:25.829+0000)
>
> Idk what you mean.
> 
> It's all games in Summoner's Rift. The bug IS live atm, if that's what you're asking.

I was wondering if maybe it was just a bug with spectator mode in particular, which happens sometimes, or if players see it during the actual match.

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=tfiE2kZF,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2019-01-15T02:32:15.652+0000)
>
> I was wondering if maybe it was just a bug with spectator mode in particular, which happens sometimes, or if players see it during the actual match.

It is in game and spectator mode. Morde has to be the one to last hit the dragon tho. It's as of patch 9.1.

I wonder what bugs the next patch brings! He gets more bugs with every patch. 300 and counting! :)
